segments.text: Ugh, what a messy situation in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out of the sink like that, all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, soaking the woman's shoe and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying that plate, completely ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets look ruined with water streaming down them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kidsâ€”sneaking cookies on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching too far, and it's gross how precarious it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies falling maybe, adding to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging for her piece of the naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden view can't hide the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel queasy thinking about the potential slip and fall in that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet already, for goodness' sake.
segments.speaker: PAR
